alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 07 at 7:46PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Spotty Light Wintry Mix Through This Evening... An approaching frontal boundary has been allowing for areas of light precipitation to move across the eastern Catskills, mid Hudson Valley, central and southern Taconics and northwestern Connecticut. Precipitation may fall as a wintry mix of rain, snow, sleet and freezing rain. As a result of falling temperatures and the light precipitation, a slick light coating of ice and snow may accumulate on some surfaces, especially untreated roadways and walkways. Locally slippery walking and traveling conditions are possible, so use caution if you will be out through the late evening hours.
